attributes.action: Help People Raise Cash for Community Development.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am 16, and next year i am looking at going to somewhere such as peru or figi to help the less privalaged kids have a half decent start to life, building schools etc. 

The government seem to "waste" taxpayers cash on expenses etc, (so we've been hearing in the media) so could they not spare a few million helping teenagers like myself to go out to less developed countries and help underprivalaged kids.!?!?!
